item.title: ‘Giant’ Starring John Lithgow Is Coming to Broadway in March
item.description: Following its award-winning run on London’s West End,” Giant,” starring John Lithgow, is headed to Broadway. The show stars Lithgow as Roald Dahl and follows the author as his next book, &
